00033 #ifndef DATASOURCE_HPP_
00034 #define DATASOURCE_HPP_
00035 
00036 #include "libidx.h"
00037 
00038 namespace ebl {
00039 
00040 template<typename T, typename L>
00041 LabeledDataSource<T,L>::LabeledDataSource(Idx<T> *data, Idx<L> *labels)
00042         //:data(data),
00043         // labels(labels),
00044         :dataIter(*data, 0),
00045     labelsIter(*labels,0)
00046 {
00047         this->data = data;
00048         this->labels = labels;
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<typename T, typename L>
00052 int LabeledDataSource<T,L>::size() {
00053         return this->data->dim(0);
00054 }
00055 
00056 template<typename T, typename L>
00057 void LabeledDataSource<T,L>::fprop(state_idx *state, Idx<L> *label) {
00058         //state->setndim(data.order()-1)
00059         //state.resize(data.dims()+1, data.dims()+data.order());
00060         state->resize(1, data->dim(1), data->dim(2)); // TODO: make this generic
00061         //label->resize();
00062         idx_copy(*dataIter, state->x);
00063         idx_copy(*labelsIter, *label);
00064 }
00065 
00066 template<typename T, typename L>
00067 void LabeledDataSource<T,L>::next() {
00068         ++dataIter;
00069         ++labelsIter;
00070 
00071         if(!dataIter.notdone()) {
00072                 dataIter = data->dim_begin(0);
00073                 labelsIter = labels->dim_begin(0);
00074         }
00075 }
00076 
00077 template<typename T, typename L>
00078 void LabeledDataSource<T,L>::seek_begin() {
00079   dataIter = data->dim_begin(0);
00080         labelsIter = labels->dim_begin(0);
00081 }
00082 
00084 
00085 template<class I, class L>
00086 MnistDataSource<I, L>::MnistDataSource(Idx<I> *inp, Idx<L> *lbl,
00087                 intg w, intg h, double b, double c)
00088         : LabeledDataSource<I, L>(inp, lbl) {
00089   bias = b;
00090   coeff = c;
00091   width = w;
00092   height = h;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template<class I, class L>
00096 void MnistDataSource<I, L>::fprop(state_idx *out, Idx<L> *label) {
00097   out->resize(1, height, width);
00098   intg ni = (this->data)->dim(1);
00099   intg nj = (this->data)->dim(2);
00100   intg di = 0.5 * (height - ni);
00101   intg dj = 0.5 * (width - nj);
00102   idx_fill(out->x, bias * coeff);
00103   Idx<double> tgt = (out->x).select(0, 0);
00104   tgt = tgt.narrow(0, ni, di);
00105   tgt = tgt.narrow(1, nj, dj);
00106   idx_copy(*(this->dataIter), tgt);
00107   idx_addc(out->x, bias, out->x);
00108   idx_dotc(out->x, coeff, out->x);
00109   label->set(this->labelsIter->get());
00110 }
